Texts.Chs: ^orange;木制筛粉机^reset;需要电力才能正常使用，它可以从物质中筛选出有用的材料，遗憾的是它只能作用于沙子、砾石和其他松散的物质。并且木制筛粉机筛选过程有些慢，所以请你别抱怨。快制造一个^orange;木制筛粉机^reset;吧！
Texts.Eng: A ^orange;Wooden Sifter^reset; requires power, but allows you to toss in sand, gravel and other loose materials and sift for hidden goodies. Very useful. The wood sifter is quite slow. But one cannot complain about free resources. Try building a ^orange;Wooden Sifter^reset; now.

Texts.Chs: 如果你想让它更自动化，请尝试制作以下两个设备：物质传输器、储存桥接器，然后把它们连接到木制筛粉机上！这样一来的话，产出的材料就会自动转移到你的储存容器里了！
Texts.Eng: If you want to step up your game, try creating a few items next: ^orange;Router^reset; a ^orange;Storage Bridge^reset; linking them to the Sifter! You'll be able to automatically transfer from a crafting station to a storage container!
